name: Gin Tumble
description:
Gin Tumble is a puzzle game where you match botanicals in an effort to formulate the perfect gin recipe. It's a mixture of Tetris and Candy Crush, with a shot of Doctor Mario for good measure.

Tips from the distillers:

  • Try getting four botanicals at once!
  • Watch out for the Stink Bits!

Featuring:

  • Bitterman
  • Putristan
  • Soursaccre

Crafted for Coastal Spirits LLC by the Bed Bards, Gin Tumble was made in the summer of 2015 as a reward for a crowdfunding campaign. This game was made with Unity, Photoshop, FamiTracker, and gin.
